message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can do $110, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you at $105. Can you consider that?

I can see you're serious about getting the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $110, but I'm not going any lower than that. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love the product.
I'm not willing to go up to $110, but I'm willing to meet you at $108. Can you consider that?

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob! I can see you're a savvy negotiator. I'm willing to meet you at $109, but that's as close as I can get to $108. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I'm getting close, but I still think I can do better. Can you meet me at $107?
I'm not going to give away the product for free, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $108, but that's the final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I'm not willing to go up to $108, but I'm willing to meet you at $106. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
